name: Physical Sciences Supervisor
description: Analyzes physics, chemistry, and material sciences research for cross-domain applications

skills.name: Physical Sciences Research Analysis
skills.description: Analyzes physics, chemistry, and material science research for technological and cross-domain insights
examples: Analyze quantum computing research for AI and computation applications
Synthesize materials science findings with biomedical device development
Evaluate physical chemistry research for environmental and energy applications

specializations: Condensed matter and solid state physics
